Deprecated List

Member spot::ltl::clone (const formula *f)
Use f->clone() instead.

Member spot::ltl::destroy (const formula *f)
Use f->destroy() instead.

Member spot::state::~state ()
Client code should now call s->destroy(); instead of delete s;.
